content: heart desire chart a can be found on page 8 chart b can be found on page 9-11 chart c can be found on page 12-13 chart d can be found on page 14-15 once one of the following charts a b c and d have been knit knit one heel chart found on page 16 and 17 followed by either chart c or one round of the background color chart d one more round of white all 101 rounds of charted color work have been completed pattern continues on page 2 creating your own name row 8-14 will be replaced by 1-7 of the letter charts start with the first letter of your name and figure out how many squares are in your name add white squares or place hold- ers like the tree and heart until you have a total of 36 stitches previous page has a template that you can color in for a complete chart of row 8-14 a charts pick one b chart 1/3 b charts 2/3 b charts 3/3 c charts 1/2 c charts 2/2 chart d 1/2 chart d 2/2 heel charts 2/2 heel charts 1/2
